TestCase.name: testDoesNotMatchAntiJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM T1 JOIN T2 ON a = c) t WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT e FROM T3 WHERE a = e)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[NOT(EXISTS({ LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.a, $0)]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]) }))], variablesSet=[[$cor0]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[anti]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[true]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

TestCase.name: testInnerJoinToMultiJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 JOIN T2 ON a = c JOIN (SELECT * FROM T3 ) ON a = e AND e > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), =($0, $2))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($2, $0), >($2, 10))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

TestCase.name: testDoesNotMatchFullOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 FULL OUTER JOIN T2 ON a = c, T3 WHERE a = e AND e > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[full]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[full]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

TestCase.name: testDoesNotMatchLeftOuterJoinRightOuterJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN T2 ON a = c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T3) ON a = e AND e > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[right]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[right]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

TestCase.name: testDoesNotMatchSemiJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM T1 JOIN T2 ON a = c) t WHERE a IN (SELECT e FROM T3)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[IN($0, { LogicalProject(e=[$0]) LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]) })]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[semi]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[inner]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinLeftOuterJoinToMultiJoin
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2 ON a = c LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM T3) ON a = e AND e > 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $4), >($4, 10))], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $2)], joinType=[left]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]]) +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$4], d=[$5], e=[$2], f=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $4)], joinType=[left]) :- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($0, $2), >($2, 10))], joinType=[left]) : :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T1]]) : +- LogicalProject(e=[$0], f=[$1]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T3]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, T2]])
